title: "Can Social Capital Save Us From The Robots?"
excerpt: "The bottom line in making sure that happens is, dare we say, Social Capital! Because, if we are always using respect for the value and importance of people as our real bottom line, it will be the ultimate litmus test for weeding out anything--including AI and technology--that gets in the way of that."
